name: Zombie Burg
description:
In a remote region during the Middle Ages a mysterious plague has struck the kingdom. Investigate as the white knight and solve the mystery.

Zombie Burg is a physics based lowpoly game in third person. Fight with different weapons, such as a bat, paddle or fruit box.

Zombie Burg was made 100% by us, both in models and in code.  Music and audio effects were found on YouTube under common creative license. Let us know what you think about it! :)
